## Small help, if project created in RStudio first, then connect to GitHub

## Sets the new remote
## $ git remote add origin remote repository URL
## Verifies the new remote URL
## $ git remote -v
## Pushes the changes in your local repository up to the remote repository you specified as the origin 
## $ git push origin master
## If that does not work, pull first
## $ git pull origin master --allow-unrelated-histories


### Read the input csv dataset

```{r}
getwd()
# Read csv, use ANSI encoding
d.file <- read.csv("input/Konto_RB_2017.csv", sep=";", head=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, encoding = "ANSI")
head(d.file)
dim(d.file)
d.file
```
